Uses of Class
panama.annotations.Action

Packages that use Action
panama.core Contains all core classes of the framework. 
panama.util Provides misc. utility classes and also some Controllers used by some tools.

Uses of Action in panama.util
 

Methods in panama.util with annotations of type Action
 Target TableController.setEpp()
          This action sets the entriesPerPage property in a table model Expected parameters in request: - tableid - epp
 Target TableController.setPagingEnabled()
          This action sets the entriesPerPage property in a table model Expected parameters in request: - tableid - enabled (values true or false)
 Target TableController.setSearchQuery()
          This action sets the entriesPerPage property in a table model Expected parameters in request: - tableid - properties a string with the names of the properties to search (separated by non-word character(s)) - q the text to search for
 Target TableController.sort()
          This action sets sorting parameters in a table Expected parameters in request: - tableid - property
 Target TableController.turnTo()
          This action sets the currentPage property in a table Expected parameters in request: - tableid - page
